 2008-03642008-02-18,  ,  FIN,  , 
ActBank of Canada Act
PrecisApproval of the appointment by the Minister of Finance of BRIAN A. HENLEY of St. John's, Newfoundland and Labrador, as a director of the Board of Directors of the Bank of Canada to hold office during good behaviour for a term ending February 28, 2011, in the place of Paul D. Dicks, effective March 1, 2008.
